Section.name: Validation
Section.Content: Mandatory information - please enter a value.
The value '{0}' is not valid as year month, please use format yyyy-mm

Section.name: AdminMasterPage
Section.Content: Information about the user logged in the system.
Welcome to the CVnavigator one-step wizard for creating a new CV Management site in just a few seconds. Fill in the fields below and you are ready to go.
This page shows how many records of each table have been updated or inserted in the last 30 days.
Welcome to CVnavigator - CV Management Made Easy

The graph shows the chosen skill at the center and related skills around it. Two skills are considered closely related if they typically are used on the same projects. The bolder the line, the closer the connection. Click a node to make it the center of the graph.
Be aware that CVnavigator is optimized for Firefox. Although you can use most features of CVnavigator with other browsers, you will get the best experience using Firefox.
Skill matrix - Mapping skills to profiles

Section.Content: Edit the label- and the helptext

Section.Content: Some validation errors were found. Do you wish to continue anyway?
This is a confirmation of entered data is saved.

Section.name: AutoFormExt
Section.Content: This will delete the choosen language. A validation will be presented to you - informing of the consequences of this action. If validation meets any obstructions - CVnavigator will give an list of items to take actions on before deleting will be possible.

Section.name: Customer
Section.Content: We found the following customers with similar names or aliases: {0}

Section.name: SearchCv
Section.Content: Choose what kind of contract you wish to be searched
Specify the status values you would like to search for CVs
Specify which types of contractual you want to speed search
Indicate when the consultant must be accessible in terms of number of days from today's date
Identify the persons to which the search should be adapted. If you do not select any, all individuals will be searched.
Specify which customers the consultant must have worked in previous projects. If you do not select any clients, search will be conducted across all.

Section.name: Resource
Section.Content: The year where you started to work
The hourly rate as the resource cost consultancy firm.
This title will appear at the top of the resume as a heading.
Determine which skills are relevant to this resource, eg competence scheme.
Enter the name of the agency - if relevant - that have given this resource.
Ex. who are you as a person.
Image will be downscaled to 200x200 pixel if it is larger
The expected duration of the next contract in months
Is the current contract expected to be extended?
Is the consultant interested in travelling?
Photo URL (only if no photo is uploaded)
This can be an URL pointing to an external photo found on a different web-site. If a photo is uploaded above, the Photo URL will be ignored.
Instant Messaging address, e.g. skype, viber etc

Section.name: EditCv
Section.Content: This resource has got imported text from a word document, pdf document, or the like. The text shown in this window. You can freely edit the text, for example, cut out parts of the text that is inserted. Changes are saved when the field is exited. If you delete the entire contents of the field, this part of the page disappear for the future.
The document is imported on a previous occasion. Note: There is no guarantee that this document is maintained.
When the import is finished, the text below is deleted and so are any documents that are saved
An imported document is attached to this CV. When all relevant data from the imported document has been incorporated into this CV, make sure to finish off the import by clicking the link below.
Import data should be incorporated as structured CV data and when this is completed imports can be completed using a link below. Import data is visible from all tabs on this page.
Enter information about projects or other relevant...

This page shows you which sites (companies, organisations etc.) you have granted access to your CV. These companies and organisations can read and edit your CV-data and contact you by email notifications. At any time you are free to remove any of these site relations without further notice.

To grant a site access to your CV you must ask the site administrator for at site code (typically 4-8 characters) and enter that code in the field below.

This pane allows you to get a behavior profile (similar to DISC).

Please choose a language and press start.
Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter
Currently not possible due to an error
Your user account will be deleted and all your attached data. It will not be possible to undue this.
Not possible to subscribe due to missing email

Section.name: Language
Section.Content: This field defines the country within the language is spoken.

Section.name: NewSite
Section.Content: Information about the owner of this site
Information about the administration user of this site

Section.name: SysRoot
Section.Content: Will be used as the name of the site. Would typically be a company or brand name and will occur on all pages as a part of the identity of the site.

The company ALIAS in CVnavigator is an short nickname used in the system in different ways.
Ex. administrator login will be 'admin.nickname'.
Should contain no spaces or special characters.
The choice of system determines the available functionality.

Section.name: SysOwner
Section.Content: The email address on the owner of this site. This can be the same email as below but does not have to.
This logo is visual on every PDF, printed or emaillink generated CV for display.

Section.name: UserObj
Section.Content: Email and login on the administrator user of this CV-Navigator site.

The name must be specified when logging on. Note that it may be advantageous to use company code above as part of the user name otherwise it can be hard to make unique across the entire CVNavigator's user database.

Section.name: CvmWebFacade
Section.Content: A new site was succesfully created for '{1}', the global system ID is {0} and the administration user is {2}.

Section.name: ImportData
Section.Content: You can import a standard data set. Please note that all data in the database will be deleted and overwritten with the contents of the spreadsheet. This feature is designed for start-up of new sites.

Section.name: ImportCvs
Section.Content:
Upload new compressed file or use excisting uploaded ZIP file.
Please select the preferred ZIP file in the dropdown.
The selected ZIP file will be used as the import source.
It is possible to select a new or an earlier ZIP file.

This page defines the rules that govern how the name derived from CVs filenames. In the fields to the right you can specify a list of words that should be ignored. In the box below called 'Name of resourcen' can be seen the result of the rules set up. Can be used wild cards using *. For example, '* CV' match everything ending with the letters CV.
Here are the final data of how CVs will be imported. One can both on and off-select for each CV on it to import and edit the name of the resource as CV belongs.
Do you want to hide every resource succesful imported?
If you have CVs lying in a local zip file you can upload it here.
Select ZIP file on your desktop.
There were already uploaded zip file with the same name. The new was therefore assigned the name '{0}'.
To remove certain email addresses from the list below, please enter them here. Seperate with whitespace or newline.
You can edit the email addresses. If more than one address is found, please delete the wrong ones. Blank lines will be considered as "no email".
Certain of the resources were already found in the database. Please specify the desired action below.
Nothing yet imported. Before going to the next step you must import one or more resources using the dialog below. Click the button "Import Resources" to execute the import.

Section.name: SkillMgr

Section.name: AcceptedConditions
Section.Content: I have read, understood and accepted all conditions listed above.

Godkendelse til at håndtere personlige informationer

Jeg giver hermed mit samtykke til, at {0} opbevarer mit CV i {0} CV-database. Endvidere giver jeg mit samtykke til, at {0} må registrere, opbevare og behandle mine personlige data. Jeg bekræfter også, at jeg aldrig har været straffet for økonomisk kriminalitet.

Vi indhenter og behandler dine personoplysninger i det omfang, det er nødvendigt for:

1. at etablere og vedligeholde et ansættelsesforhold til dig og/eller træffe aftale om opgaver til dig

2. at vurdere din egnethed til en stilling eller en opgave

3. at informere dig om relevante muligheder og/eller tilbyde dig undervisningsmuligheder og ydelser i forbindelse med karriereskift

4. at administrere erhvervsmæssig risiko, afgørelse og forsvar i forbindelse med retlige krav og sagsanlæg, overholdelse af retskendelser og andre retlige forpligtelser og lovgivningsmæssige krav.

Vi indhenter og behandler kun følsomme personoplysninger med dit samtykke eller i situationer, hvor vi skal overholde retlige forpligtelser.

De personoplysninger, som du opgiver til os, kan blive videregivet til alle enheder i {0} organisation. Endvidere giver jeg mit samtykke til, at {0} eksponere og videregivelse anonymiserede oplysninger til kunder eller andre.

Du har ret til at opdatere og rette i dine personoplysninger, samt slette dine oplysninger i overensstemmelse med "loven om behandling af personoplysninger,§5, stk 4" [www.datatilsynet.dk]

Approval to handle personal information.

I hereby give my consent to {0} to keep my CV in {0} database. Furthermore, I give my consent to {0} to register, store and process my personal data.

I hereby also affirm that I have never been convicted of financial crimes.

We collect and process your personal data to the extent it is required to:

1. establish and maintain an employment relationship with you and / or agree on the tasks for you

2. assess your suitability for a position or an assignment

3. inform you of relevant opportunities and / or offer you teaching opportunities and services for career change

4. manage commercial risk, decision and defense of legal claims and litigation, compliance with court orders and other legal obligations and regulatory requirements.

We collect and process sensitive personal data only with your consent or in situations where we must comply with legal obligations.

The personal information you provide to us may be passed to all units in {0}.

Furthermore, I give my consent to {0} to expose and disclosure of anonymised information to clients or others.

You have the right to update and correct your personal information and delete your information in accordance with the law on processing of personal data, § 5, paragraph 4 "[www.datatilsynet.dk]
Receive our newsletter (Can be un-subscript from the 'MySite' page)

Section.name: SysProfiles
Section.Content: Some errors happened while saving the skill matrix. Please press Save.

Section.name: SysProfile
Section.Content: Setup the skill matrix by selecting which skills should be associated with which profiles, marked by a green box. Click a box to select/deselect. To select/deselect multiple press CTRL/SHIFT while moving the mouse across the matrix.
In order to build up the skill matrix you need to add some skills.
In order to build up the skill matrix you must create a profile.
In order to build up the skill matrix you must add some skills and some profiles.

Section.name: DiscProfileResultCtrl
Section.Content: The dominating characteristic is that of an integrator. A typical integrator has strong social skills and will strive for better interactions and communication among all members of the team.
The dominating behavior characteristic is that of an entrepreneur, driven by innovation and new ideas. Brings creativity into any project.
The dominating characteristic is that of a producer, a person driven by results and performance. With a producer on your team, you can be sure to get things done.
The dominating characteristic is that of an administrator. With an administrator on your team you know things will be well planned and carefully processed.

The complete behavioral profile is described by the diagram on the right with the following abbreviations:
E: Entrepreneur ({0}/100)
I: Integrator ({1}/100)
A: Administrator ({2}/100)
P: Producer ({3}/100)
